statements: SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory;
SELECT item_name, price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE category = 'Shirts';
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM clothing_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE category LIKE 'Pants%';
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory WHERE category = 'Shirts' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND category = 'Pants';
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT category, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM clothing_inventory GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM clothing_items WHERE item_price > 50;
SELECT item_name, item_stock FROM clothing_items ORDER BY item_stock DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM clothing_items WHERE item_category = 'Shoes' ORDER BY item_price ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, item_id, transaction_type, quantity_changed FROM inventory_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'IN' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM clothing_items WHERE item_category = 'Shoes';
SELECT * FROM clothing_items ORDER BY item_price DESC, item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_stock FROM clothing_items WHERE item_price > 50 AND item_stock < 100 ORDER BY item_name;

SELECT c.item_name, i.transaction_date, i.quantity_changed FROM clothing_items c INNER JOIN inventory_transactions i ON c.item_id = i.item_id WHERE i.transaction_type = 'Sale' ORDER BY i.quantity_changed DESC;
SELECT AVG(item_price) AS avg_price, MAX(item_price) AS max_price, MIN(item_price) AS min_price FROM clothing_items;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items;
SELECT item_name, unit_price FROM clothing_items ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_category, quantity_available FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity_available > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers;
SELECT order_id, item_id, supplier_id, total_price FROM orders ORDER BY total_price;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items;
SELECT item_name, item_category, unit_price FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity_available > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, phone_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT item_name, unit_price, quantity_ordered, total_price FROM clothing_items INNER JOIN orders ON clothing_items.item_id = orders.item_id;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items;
SELECT item_name, price FROM clothing_items WHERE item_category='Shoes' ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_category, quantity FROM clothing_items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY item_category ASC, item_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM item_locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'St%';
SELECT item_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM item_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_category FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity >= 10 AND item_category = 'Shoes';

SELECT item_name, price, quantity, location_name FROM clothing_items JOIN item_inventory ON clothing_items.item_id = item_inventory.item_id JOIN item_locations ON item_inventory.location_id = item_locations.location_id WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100;

SELECT item_id, item_name, location_name, transaction_type FROM clothing_items JOIN item_transactions ON clothing_items.item_id = item_transactions.item_id JOIN item_locations ON item_transactions.location_id = item_locations.location_id WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(quantity_in_stock) AS total_stock, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM item_inventory JOIN clothing_items ON item_inventory.item_id = clothing_items.item_id;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM clothing_items ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT brand_name, country_of_origin FROM brands WHERE country_of_origin='USA';
SELECT color_name FROM colors WHERE color_name='Blue';
SELECT item_name, stock_quantity FROM clothing_items WHERE stock_quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items ORDER BY item_name DESC, item_price ASC, stock_quantity DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM clothing_items WHERE item_category = 'Shoes' OR item_category = 'Tops' ORDER BY item_price DESC;

SELECT brands.brand_name, brands.country_of_origin, COUNT(inventory.quantity) AS total_stock FROM brands INNER JOIN clothing_items ON brands.brand_id = clothing_items.brand_id INNER JOIN inventory ON inventory.item_id = clothing_items.item_id GROUP BY brands.brand_name, brands.country_of_origin;

SELECT colors.color_name, SUM(inventory.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM colors INNER JOIN inventory ON colors.color_id = inventory.color_id GROUP BY colors.color_name HAVING total_quantity > 50 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_price, stock_quantity FROM clothing_items WHERE item_price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 50.00 AND stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_price ASC, stock_quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
